name: Miku
description: Miku Nakano Telegram Group Management Bot Created by :- Github.com/PrincesssGirlXD

API_ID.description: Create Your Api Id From :- my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Create Your Api Hash From :- my.telegram.org/apps

SUDO_USERS_ID.description: Add Id of Sudo/Dev Users Example :- 123456788 103938337 39383848

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Add Id of Your Logger Group Example :-   -1003737373774

GBAN_LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Add Gban Logger Group/Channel Id Example :-   -1234567890

ARQ_API_URL.description: For Music Downloading And Many More Things... Don't change this value

MESSAGE_DUMP_CHAT.description: Logger Id Where All Useless Messages Will Go.

RSS_DELAY.description: Delay in which RSS will send updates in chat
